sec.title: Ethics approval
sec.p: All experimental procedures involving the use of animals were approved by the Ethics Committee of UNAERP (Protocol No. 042/2012) and were conducted in accordance to current legislation and guidelines for the use of experimental animals.

sec.title: Competing interests
sec.p: The authors declare that they have no competing interests.
